Text: Thanks for the whole season of MiC and many others.  We escaped the end of the world alive!  Happy New Year!

Happy New Year to you too and all!!
Here's to another year of Pirate Bay Happiness!!!!
I didn't want the Mayans to be right (or our wrong interpretation of their calendar!!).
I was kinda looking forward to seeing Jesus returning with a sword!! (as in "Matthew 10:34). 
Now that's a movie I gotta see!!!!

Gaz, I created a username just to thank you for all the wonderful British torrents that you posted on TPB in 2012.  Last semester I had to work full-time while studying for a graduate degree and looking forward to new MiCs, TOWIEs, and others is what got me through most days (haha is that sad? If so, pretend I never said that). But truly - you provide an awesome service to the world, thanks for brightening all of our days!!  You're a legend!  I have a lot of UK friends from teaching English in Asia, and if I ever make it there (fingers crossed!), you can expect MULTIPLE pints of beer on me!

Cheers mate :)
That is very nice of you. I am glad I can take those studying blues away with some of your favourite shows. I hope I keep getting lucky and post TOWIE, MiC and all the other UK shows people can't find for the whole of 2013 :)
PS- When we do catch up for a beer, we won't watch any sports. You guys are kickin our arses in that department at the moment!!!
thx for all your your time and effort bringing us the shows we love in 2012 Gary, we appreciate your hard work, cheers. You are our fav ozzie Gary
Gary, All the best from Dubai. Thanks a million for your uploads throughout the year, your a legend!! x
Thanks as always Gaz. The other night there was a Made in Chelsea Channel 4 Mash Up. Not sure if you're able to get this one or not? Cheers anyway!

I just posted it!!
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7990117/Made_In_Chelsea_Celebrity_Mash_Up_2012.avi
Talk about good timing!!
